pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:2.1: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:3.1: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:5.1: 70. The second training rule on students
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:6.2: At that time, after giving the full ordination to a student, the nun Thullanandā neither took her away nor had her taken away.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:6.3: And her husband got hold of her.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:7.1: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:7.3: “How can Venerable Thullanandā give the full ordination to a student and then neither take her away nor have her taken away? Her husband got hold of her.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:7.4: If this nun had gone away, her husband would not have got hold of her.” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:7.5: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:7.8: How can the nun Thullanandā give the full ordination to a student and then neither take her away nor have her taken away, so that her husband got hold of her?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:7.9: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:7.10: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:8.1: ‘If a nun gives the full ordination to her student, and then neither takes her away nor has her taken away, even just 65 to 80 kilometers, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:9.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Orders through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:10.6: she does not herself take her away.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:10.8: she does not ask anyone else to take her away.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:10.9: If she thinks, “I will not take her away nor have her taken away, even just 65 to 80 kilometers,” then by the mere fact of giving up the duty, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:11.2: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:12.1: The tenth training rule is finished.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc70:12.2: The seventh chapter on pregnant women is finished.
